entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:48 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 03:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 14.

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
